original: 泰山南城人，晉惠帝第二任皇后羊獻容之父。八王之亂時，成都王司馬穎及河間王司馬顒以「羊玄之、皇甫商等恃寵作禍」為由，出兵攻打長沙王司馬乂，羊玄之憂懼而卒。
text: A native of Taishan Nancheng, the father of Yang Xianrong, the second empress of Jin Hui. During the Rebellion of the Eight Kings, Chengdu King Simaying and Hejian King Sima Yong used "Yang Xuanzhi, Huangfu Shang and other pets to be a disaster" and sent troops to attack Changsha King Sima Yi. Yang Xuanzhi died in fear.
